entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:08 PM NDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:08 PM NDT Thursday 27 April 2023
